item.title: About
item.description: ✉️ You can check out my GitHub account to see what I’m up to and contact me via Twitter @kai_wolfram, Keybase or email. 🌍 I’m currently living in Germany. Spoken Languages: 🇩🇪 German (native) 🇺🇸 English (proficient) 🇲🇽 Spanish (currently working towards proficiency) Technology stack: Rust, Java, TypeScript MySQL, Elasticsearch, Redis, MongoDB Bitcoind WebAssembly, Svelte, HTML, CSS Linux Git, GitHub, VSCode, IntelliJ, Eclipse Donations: Bitcoin: bc1qrhxputc6t45w8p2j8k7ke72a9zgqgt3q5gkgat Lightning address: kai@bitrefill.
